name: Wasteland Billionaire
description:
Have you ever dreamed of becoming a billionaire by owning some land?
Are you looking for a new and free idle game that's a lot of fun?
Look no further! Come and join as Brenda's partner to build and manage a special plot of land...be prepared to transform it from "wasteland" to an amazing beach! As someone who will be managing everything—you are now the BOSS!
You can build gyms, hotels, restaurants, bars, beach playgrounds, and much more on your beach. Try your best to keep your visitors happy, and earn as much as you can while doing so!
But BEWARE! You may come across thieves disguised as tourists who will come steal all your earnings. You will need to hire as much security as possible to help guard your land...and your pockets! Also, if you like to play dirty—you may also travel to other players' territories to find and collect some extra income. By the way, don't get caught!
Begin your journey in Wasteland Billionaire now!!

Features:
- Easy-to-play and casual idle game for every player
- Different challenges and missions to complete
- Great 3D graphics and beautiful animations
- Make essential decisions to build up your own business
- Different strategies to improve your business
